channel.title: Trouble with Megaupload!
channel.description:
Alright, I upload a file, when I start to download it it is a Unknown source... How do I make it that it is a Folder/ winRAR? I trying to upload my SanitationScape_Source! Not going to get anywere wihout someones HELP! I will ++!!
Please Help!
-Timister[br][size=1]Posted at: November 18, 2006, 06:38:09 AM[/size][hr][glow=red,2,300][font=Verdana][shadow=red,left][s][u][b]SanitationScape[/b][/u][/s][/shadow][/font][/glow] Trying to upload this... haveing trouble with megaupload HAVING TROUBLE!

item.title: Trouble with Megaupload!
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

as soon as you download it, if you have WinRAR, it should automatically go there

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble with Megaupload!
item.dc:creator: @Timister Timister
item.description:
@Timister wrote:

This is what I do:
Were it says:
Select file to send (maximum 500 MB)

I enter the name of my Source: SanitationScape_Source
then I add a .rar, so it looks like: SanitationScape_Source.rar
Then I enter meaningful description, then I check I accept the terms, then I wait for it to finish uploading, then I download it, I try to Open or Extract it, but it all doesnt work… Thats what I do, anything wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble with Megaupload!
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

after you download it, it should ask you to save it or run it, save it. if you have WinRAR it should automatically go there.

Read full topic
